claims.object: A measure of a cross-section's resistance to bending

surface_layer.definition: A geometrical property of an area that shows how its points are distributed with regard to an axis.

deep_layer.mechanism: Represents the resistance of a cross-section to bending about a given axis.
deep_layer.origin: Calculated based on the shape and dimensions of the cross-section.

examples: 0.034 in^4 for a 1-inch nominal diameter schedule 40 steel tube

citations: ASTM Steel Tube Pipe Section Properties - Engineers Edge
